attributes.action: Respect Democracy and Exit the EU on No Deal so business can plan.
attributes.additional_details: Small businesses cannot live with the ongoing uncertainty over future planning.  This is not only UK companies, but those throughout the EU exporting to the UK.
attributes.background: The nation is risking destroying democracy by not honouring the referendum.  The country's appointed representatives should, in the event of not being able to agree a good deal, be prepared to exit on WTO rules with immediate effect.
